pageContent.title: Planning for Success
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Planning for Success</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“You’ve done a great job using your planning skills to align yourself to your customer’s priorities and prescribing cycle. This is the way to ensure early on that your customer truly sees you as an advisor they can trust, and not just as a sales rep trying to rush them into a prescribing decision.” </welcomeText>
